basics.name: Michael Fine
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I am a high school senior and self-taught programmer, specializing in Javascript web applications and Haskell. When I'm not at school, I'm hacking on open source projects, wrestling, playing around with robots, or attending hackathons.

work.summary: NGP VAN is the leading technology provider to Democratic and progressive campaigns and organizations, offering clients an integrated platform of the best fundraising, compliance, field, organizing, new media, and social networking products.
highlights: Helped create web application to aggregate user data from disparate company websites and scrape social media to create targeted user profiles
Created internal tool to gamify clean coding

work.summary: EventKloud is a audience-driven marketing & advertising automation platform for events. Its a smarter way to create cross-channel, streamlined event campaigns to reach, engage & measure your audience all from a central dashboard.
highlights: Created dedicated mobile site, reducing page load times twofold
Created geographic dashboard to streamline sales process

interests.name: Robotics
keywords: Designed, programmed and built state qualifying robot for First Tech Challenge
Implemented Kalman filters to navigate autonomously
